Banner.Description: passionate about front end development, design and everything in between.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: I love to code , build products that solve user problems with the latest technology available. I am highly motivated, always acquire for knowledge and eager to learn new technologies and apply them to build modern web applications.
I have expertise in translating UI/UX design wireframes with actual code to visual elements. I focus much on providing the best user experience on any device like mobile, desktop, tv, etc.
My skills also include implementing system improvements, optimizing sites, standardizing patterns, and suggesting and executing ideas that add value to the project I'm working on.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Transforming mockup into HTML / CSS code and integrating them into applications
Developing and maintaining dynamic functionality of websites
Using Git as version control system for team code collaboration
Fix bugs and add new functionality
Resolve cross-browser incompatibilities between Internet Explorer, Firefox & Google Chrome,

Experience.Jobs.Title: Frontend developer
Description: Transforming mockup into HTML / CSS code and integrating them into applications
Developing and maintaining dynamic functionality of websites
Using Git as version control system for team code collaboration
Fix bugs and add new functionality for old projects
Resolve cross-browser incompatibilities between Internet Explorer, Firefox & Google Chrome,

Experience.Jobs.Title: Junior Tester
Description: Create test cases and test scenarios based on business requirements
Perform test execution for manual functional testing, regression testing and usability testing across multiple browser and device combinations
Properly log fix tasks and provide status updates
Maintain sprint updates in a timely manner
Actively participated in QA team meetings to discuss testing process

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Clips
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Video sharing application using Angular, TypeScript, WebAssembly, Rust, RxJS, TailwindCSS, Firebase and much more! This is a Fullstack app

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Online Store
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: This is a Front end application for eComerce website. The app was built with vanilla JavaScript.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Netflix Homepage clone
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A UI project where I designed and built my version of the Netflix homepage. I used HTML5, CSS3, and a bit of JavaScript for some functionalities.

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Weather Application
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: A weather web application using Html, Css, Javascript, Openweathermap api.

OtherProjects.Title: Services
Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
